articles.title: Embrace changing times, be tech-savvy for this Valentine’s Day | Lifestyle News | English Manorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: Adopt the fusion of technology and romance, creating a celebration that reflects the innovation and connection of the digital era.
articles.content: New Delhi: Traditional courtship is now a thing of the past and what has taken its place are fast-paced communication and virtual meetups. There are many innovative ways to nurture relationships. So,… [+3088 chars]

articles.title: NASA solar sail technology passes crucial deployment test - Phys.org
